1.0.name: wordpress/fw-vimeo-videowall
1.0.description:
Displays a user, group, album or channel vimeo videowall with thumbnails or small videos or a list of video titles in sidebar or content.

Choice to use

  • Widget : A widget with custom settings
  • Content Short tags : you can add a videowall to a post or page
  • Template tag : for advanced themes, you can place the videowall wherever you want using a template tag

You may choose to display clickable video thumbnails or titles which will open a window with Vimeo default sized video or small playable videos. You may choose how many thumbnails or titles you want to display. You may display video title under its thumbnail.

Localized

  • English
  • French
